author: Daniel Greene
description:
In this video I break down The Wheel of Time magic system — including the One Power, Saidin, Saidar, weaves, the True Power, and how channeling works across the books and show. This is a complete and accessible guide for new readers, returning fans, or anyone who wants to understand the deepest mechanics of Jordan’s worldbuilding.

We’ll cover the structure of the Source, how male and female channeling differ, the nature of weaves, talismanic items like angreal and ter'angreal.

title: The Wheel of Time Magic System Explained
